review.title: “A lot of wasted potential.”
review.pros: Pros – Compensation was competitive compared to other companies in the market sector. Specific acts of value contribution were occasionally rewarded by managment.
review.cons: Cons – Secretive / cult like personality at the top. The offices were bugged and there was an obsession with prying into personnel's private lives.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Focus on following good business principles and stop being a peeping tom. Spend less on legal fees trying to defend bad judgement.
